authors: Siticone Technology, Russell Chidhakwa, Ilham Mutaqin

deprecation.message:
We have released a new library that supports .NET 8 going forward.

We will be actively maintain this new library and offer frequent updates, upgrades and improvements.
Please download the new library: Siticone WinForms Version 2024.xx.xx

As always, do not forget to backup your projects.
If you have any questions, please contact us.

Thank you.
Siticone Technology

description:
Siticone Desktop UI (as part of the Siticone Framework Suite) is the leading developer productivity product in the market of .NET and Windows Forms UI/UX Design.

It is the epitome of all .NET UI developement libraries and frameworks empowering developers to create futuristic, performant, fast and clean user interface to deliver an extremely impressive user experience with minimal effort, low programming experience at a very resonable budget.

Embeded in the .NET Ecosystem, with matching industry accepted naming and design rules, the learning curve is almost flat. Once installed, a few simple clicks are enough to discover the real power of Siticone!

How to add Siticone Desktop UI to your project:
1. Install the library
2. Open Visual Studio Toolbox and create a new tab e.g. "Siticone Desktop UI Components"
3. Right-click and "Choose items".
4. "Browse..." and locate the installed library i.e. from the "bin" folder and add select.
5. Drag-n-drop any Siticone Controls onto the Winform.
That's it!

How to use Siticone Desktop UI:
1. Watch tutorials and video demos from our channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdU2lQWL-wqHmBkhhMZeTDQ?sub_confirmation=1


Minimum System and User Requirements:
-Siticone Desktop UI works with C# and VB.NET programming languages, in a Windows Forms Application Development Environment.

Minimal Technical Requirements:
- Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 or higher.
- Visual Studio 2012 or later.

Developer requirements:
- A basic knowledge of C# or VB.NET programming languages (both is an advantage).
- A basic knowledge of Windows Forms application development system (Winforms).

For more information, please visit:
https://siticoneframework.com/get-started

Support email:
-support@siticoneframework.com

Live support:
https://www.siticoneframework.com


Happy UI/UX Development!
releaseNotes:
Note: Before updating SiticoneDesktopUI.UI, don't forget to backup your project!!

Control named Licensing changed to SiticoneDesktopUILicenseManager.

New component: SiticoneDesktopUITaskBarProgress
- Allows you to display progress on the TaskBar

SiticoneDesktopUIControlBox:
- Fixed an issue with maximized borderless forms covering the taskbar.

SiticoneDesktopUIDragControl:
- Fixed an issue with DockForm.
- Fixed an issue with DragForm.
- DockForm supports multi screen.
- DragForm supports multi drag (e.g SiticoneDesktopUIDragControl1.SetDrag(panel1.Controls).

SiticoneDesktopUIElipse:
- Fixed problem with resizing control/form.

SiticoneDesktopUIBorderlessForm:
- Added DragForm property (if false, drag is disabled).
- Fixed issue with form closing
- Fixed an issue with maximized borderless forms covering the taskbar.
- Fixed an issue with resizing control/form.
- Fixed an issue with DockForm.
- Fixed an issue with DragForm.
- DockForm supports multi screen.
- DragForm supports multi drag (e.g SiticoneDesktopUIBorderless.SetDrag(panel1.Controls).

SiticoneDesktopUIVScrollBar:
- Fixed an issue with the BindingContainer property property.
- Supports binding to 'Panel'.
- Supports binding to 'FlowLayoutPanel'.
- Supports binding to 'UserControl'.
- Supports binding to 'ContainerControl'.
- Supports binding to 'TextBox'.
- Supports binding to 'RichTextBox'.
- Supports binding to 'DataGridView'.
- Supports binding to 'ListBox'.
- Supports binding to 'CheckedListBox'.
- Supports binding to 'TreeView'.
- Supports binding to 'ListView' (Note: .View = Details).

SiticoneDesktopUIHScrollBar:
- Fixed an issue with the BindingContainer property property.
- Supports binding to 'Panel'.
- Supports binding to 'FlowLayoutPanel'.
- Supports binding to 'UserControl'.
- Supports binding to 'ContainerControl'.
- Supports binding to 'TextBox'.
- Supports binding to 'RichTextBox'.
- Supports binding to 'DataGridView'.
- Supports binding to 'ListBox'.
- Supports binding to 'CheckedListBox'.
- Supports binding to 'TreeView'.

SiticoneDeviceInfo
* New Components
- Get all the Device Information under one component in milliseconds.
- Use the device ids for unique device identification
title: Siticone.Desktop.UI
